description.narrative: -Scaling up microfinance: The project will enhance FDC''s ability to support the members of the system in expanding access to financial products and services for low-income households. -Investments in Micro, Small and Medium enterprises: Through the provision of greater funding lines for the Member Institutions, they will expand their lending to El Salvadorean businesses, stimulating investment, business activity and the creation of new jobs, particularly in less developed regions of the country that are significantly under-served by the financial sector. -Support the integration of Micro and Small Enterprises into the formal sector, as access to credit is one of the principal stimuli for these businesses to move out of informality. -Support investments in the agri-business value chain through the funding of member cooperative institutions which target rural lending.

The proposed project consists of a $20 million remittance-backed funding transaction with Federación de Cajas de Crédito y de Bancos de los Trabajadores, S.C. de R.L. de C.V. (Fedecrédito or FDC) an existing client, intended to support FDCs growing portfolio of consumer, MSMEs and housing loans that are provided through its 55 member institutions.

participating-org.narrative: Federacion de Cajas de Credito y de Bancos de los Trabajadores SC de RL

mailing-address.narrative: Alex David Hernández Buendia Projects and Cooperation Secretariat FEDECRÉDITO 25 Av. Norte y 23 Calle Poniente, Edificio Macario Armando Rosales Rosa, San Salvador Phone: (503) 2209-9620 Fax: (503) 2226-5090, Mobile: (503) 7039-3403 Website: http://www.fedecredito.com.sv

name.narrative: Fedecréditoss headquarters are located in San Salvador and it has over 355 service locations across El Salvador through its member institutions.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: O-HA - Microfinance and Small Business - Non Commercial Banking

receiver-org.narrative: Federacion de Cajas de Credito y de Bancos de los Trabajadores SC de RL
